'''Mountain Date Wood''' is obtained by cutting down Mountain Date Trees. It is an item used to craft [[furnishings]].

==Locations==
Mountain Date Trees can be found in [[Land of Lower Setekh]] and [[Land of Upper Setekh]].

See the '''[https://webstatic-sea.mihoyo.com/app/ys-map-sea/index.html#/map/2?shown_types=449 Teyvat Interactive Map]''' for specific locations.
